name: Provider

methods.name: getAuthenticationCapabilities
methods.description: Returns the types of authentication that can be used to access the external system.

methods.name: getCapabilities
methods.description: Returns the functional operations that the external system supports and the required endpoint settings for the external data source definition in Salesforce.

methods.name: getConnection
methods.description: Returns a connection that points to an instance of the external data source.

description: Extend this base class to create a custom adapter for Salesforce
